text: Mahmood Abdulqader Ali (born 4 October 1983) also known as Mahmood Salman is a Bahraini handball player for Barbar Club and the Bahraini national team. He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster He was part of the national team that won the bronze medal at the 2014 Asian Games and the silver medal in 2018. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Bahraini male handball players Category:Handball players at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Handball players at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Handball players at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Handball players at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Bahrain Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Bahrain Category:Asian Games medalists in handball Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games
title: Mahmood Abdulqader
